resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

Setup ADS:
 1. Click Login and use Express Code or Browser Login
 2. Click Login again once completed 3. Go to Settings and configure
 4. Go to Sequenzia Web and go to a page with the results you want to show
(Dont forget to set resolution or aspect ratio)
 5. Toolbox > Send to App
 6. Select a import type
 7. Select Import
